unnormalised: **Manufacturing & Supply Chain: Enhanced Quality Control Measures Implemented in Tiruppur Textile Hub**
normalised: **Manufacturing and Supply Chain: Enhanced Quality Control Measures Implemented in Tiruppur Textile Hub**

unnormalised: Tiruppur, Tamil Nadu – Leading textile manufacturers in Tiruppur are adopting stricter quality control measures across their supply chains, following recent concerns regarding export standards. The Tiruppur Exporters' Association (TEA) has collaborated with Dr. Meena Iyer of IIT Madras to implement a new statistical process control system, aiming to minimize defects.
normalised: Tiruppur, Tamil Nadu – Leading textile manufacturers in Tiruppur are adopting stricter quality control measures across their supply chains, following recent concerns regarding export standards. The Tiruppur Exporters' Association (T E A) has collaborated with Doctor Meena Iyer of I I T Madras to implement a new statistical process control system, aiming to minimize defects.

unnormalised: This initiative follows reports of rejected consignments in European markets due to inconsistencies in fabric quality and colorfastness. The TEA is offering subsidized training programs to its members, focusing on pre-production checks, in-process monitoring, and final inspection protocols. The cost of implementation for individual units is estimated at Rs. 50,000, with the TEA covering a portion of this expense.
normalised: This initiative follows reports of rejected consignments in European markets due to inconsistencies in fabric quality and or colorfastness. The T E A is offering subsidized training programs to its members, focusing on pre-production checks, in-process monitoring, and final inspection protocols. unnormalised: "We aim to ensure every garment leaving Tiruppur meets global benchmarks," stated a TEA spokesperson. Several factories are investing in upgraded testing labs, adding approximately 2,000 sq ft of dedicated quality control space. These measures are expected to significantly boost the reputation of Tiruppur textiles and safeguard future exports.
